remarks: The law of concretion for operation class abstraction.  Compare ~ elopab .  (Contributed by NM, 14-Sep-1999.)  (Unnecessary distinct variable restrictions were removed by David Abernethy, 19-Jun-2012.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2013.)
statement:
eloprabga.1 $e |- ( ( x = A /\ y = B /\ z = C ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
eloprabga $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ B e. W /\ C e. X ) -> ( <. <. A , B >. , C >. e. { <. <. x , y >. , z >. | ph } <-> ps ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x y z $.
$d ps x y z $.
